summary: In the mid-18th Century, as England and France battle over control of Canada, an epic romance between a peasant woman and a trapper unfurls.
cast: Noémie Godin-Vigneau|David La Haye|Juliette Gosselin|Sébastien Huberdeau|Gérard Depardieu|Bianca Gervais|Irène Jacob|Pierre Lebeau|Vincent Perez|Isabel Richer|Johanne-Marie Tremblay|Tim Roth|Jason Isaacs|Colm Meaney|Billy Merasty|Monique Mercure|David Troughton|Michael Maloney|Maud Beauchemin|Benoît Dagenais|Myriam De Verger|Bénédicte Décary|Philippe Dormoy|Patrick Goyette|Roc LaFortune|Louise Laparé|Paul Savoie|Micky Sébastian|Maxime Allard|Zoham Amsalem|Lise Arel|Régis Aulny|Sylvie Belleau|Alex Bisping|Philippe Botta|Olivier Brault|Carole B. title: Nouvelle-France
